description:
Nurikabe is a large, sleepy-eyed wall-shaped youkai, who uses his massive size to protect Kitarou and his friends. The original Nurikabe is a spirit which blocks the passage of people walking at night.
Nurikabe first appears in a cameo as one of many youkai attending a sukiyaki party in the story A Walk to Hell (Rental version) before making a more prominent appearance in The Great Youkai War (Shounen Magazine version).
name: Nurikabe
